title: Tutorial
body:
Unlocked pastry shelf! Press 'e' near it to make pastries!
Make sure you complete customer's orders before time runs out!
Can I really do this? I’ve never even held a minimum-wage job before… What if I can’t keep up?
<< set $c1S to false >>  << set $c2S to false >> << set $c3S to false >> << set $coffeeNum to 0 >> << set $cakeNum to 0 >>

title: Customer1
body:
I see there’s a new face around here! 
It’s been a while since that has happened. The old man always insisted on doing everything himself.
One coffee please!
[[ (Give coffee) |giveCoffee1]] [[ Sure thing! |thanks1]]

title: Customer3
body:
I heard about the news. 
I’m sorry for your loss… Though I’m happy that you decided to take up the cafe! 
Your grandfather would’ve been happy to see you keep his life’s work going. 
With that being said, just a coffee for me!
[[ (Give coffee) |giveCoffee3]] [[ Sure thing! |thanks3]]

title: Customer2
body:
I love the aesthetic here but I wish there were more pastry options… 
I would like a cake please!
[[ (Give cake) |giveCake2]] [[ Sure thing! |thanks2]]

title: cakeMade
body:
<<if $cakeNum < 1>>
<<Cake>>
You made cake! +1 cake
<<else>>
You can't carry anymore cake!
<<endif>>

title: makePastries
body:
What pastry would you like to make?
[[ Cake |cakeMade]] [[ Never mind |No]]

title: coffeeMade
body:
<<if $coffeeNum < 1>>
<<Coffee>>  
You made coffee! +1 Coffee
<<else>>
You can't carry anymore coffee!
<<endif>>

title: makeDrinks
body:
What drink would you like to make?
[[ Coffee |coffeeMade]] [[ Never mind |No]]

title: giveCake2
body:
<<if $cakeNum > 0>> 
<<removeCake>>
<< set $c2S to true >>
Thank you for the cake! 
<<else>>
It seems like you didn't bring any cake with you.
<<endif>>

body: Once you make it, please bring it to me! Thank you!

title: No
body: Press "z" to exit.

title: Week2intro
body:
Hopefully it's just like last week.
<< set $c4S to false >>  << set $c5S to false >> << set $c6S to false >> << set $c7S to false >>  << set $c8S to false >> << set $c9S to false >> << set $coffeeNum to 0 >> << set $cakeNum to 0 >> << set $donutNum to 0 >>

title: introTutorial
body:
Hello! (Press "z" to go to next dialogue line and/or choose an option)
Hold "z" to also make text scroll faster.
Use arrow keys to move around.
Use up and down arrow keys to go to each option.
Press "e" to interact with appliances and customers.
That's all for controls! (Press 'z' to start intro to game)
<< set $coffeeNum to 0 >>
[[Start game!|introLore]]

title: Week4intro
body:
It’s been weeks and I feel like I’m not getting enough done. 
Sometimes I wonder if this is really what Grandpa wanted for me. He must’ve had higher expectations of me.
<< set $c22S to false >>  << set $c23S to false >> << set $c24S to false >> << set $c25S to false >>  << set $c26S to false >> << set $c27S to false >> << set $c28S to false >>  << set $c29S to false >> << set $c30S to false >> << set $c31S to false >>  << set $c32S to false >> << set $c33S to false >> << set $c35S to false >> << set $c36S to false >> << set $c37S to false >> << set $coffeeNum to 0 >> << set $cakeNum to 0 >> << set $donutNum to 0 >> << set $teaNum to 0 >> << set $sconeNum to 0>>

title: Week3intro
body:
Another week. There seems to be a lot more customers.
How can I make time to think about improving this old place when I’m always busy with customers?
<< set $c10S to false >>  << set $c11S to false >> << set $c12S to false >> << set $c13S to false >>  << set $c14S to false >> << set $c15S to false >> << set $c16S to false >>  << set $c17S to false >> << set $c18S to false >> << set $c19S to false >>  << set $c20S to false >> << set $c21S to false >> << set $coffeeNum to 0 >> << set $cakeNum to 0 >> << set $donutNum to 0 >> << set $teaNum to 0 >> << set $sconeNum to 0>>

title: summary1
body:
That wasn't so bad.
The customers also seemed grateful that I decided to re-open the cafe!
(Unlocked donuts!)
<<week2>>
[[ Go to next week |week2Load]]

title: week2Load
body: Fast Forwarding to next week...

title: week4Load
body: Fast Forwarding to next week...

title: summary3
body:
This is getting so exhausting. This cafe was meant to be my grandfather’s dream, not mine. 
Should I just give up and sell it? But then I’d let him and the slime community down… 
<<week4>>
[[ Go to next week |week4Load]]

title: summary2
body:
It's starting to get a bit busy.
How did Grandpa do this all by himself? 
(Unlocked tea and scones!)
(Can now stack an additional pastry and drink!)
<<week3>>
[[ Go to next week |week3Load]]

title: week3Load
body: Fast Forwarding to next week...

title: summary4
body:
....
..........
Despite it being a very busy week, I did enjoy interacting with the slimes and seeing how happy they get when I complete their orders. 
Maybe this was why grandpa was willing to keep this cafe up for so long…
<<endChoices>>
[[ Go to next week |endingLoad]]

title: endingLoad
body: Fast Forwarding to ??? week...

title: endingChoices
body:
Weeks pass and you slowly begin to develop a routine. 
It’s starting to feel a lot more natural and more slimes have started coming to the cafe after hearing of its success and friendly owner. 
Working in the cafe and Interacting with the slimes has left a positive lasting impression on you. 
You still have feelings of self-doubt from time to time but you’re feeling more confident in your skills now! 
Grandpa would’ve been proud of you. :)
End of story! (Press 'z' to go to credits)
<<credits>>
[[ Go to Credits|ending1]]

title: ending1
body: Going to credits...

title: ending2
body:
It's over... I've done all I could, but it's just not enough.
This place meant everything to me, but sometimes... 
you have to accept that all things don't always work out.
Not everything can be saved, no matter how hard you try. 
Holding on too tightly only leads to more loss... I had to let go, for my own sake.
Thank you for the memories... and for a new beginning.
<<credits>>
[[ Go to Credits|ending1]]

body:

I’m glad to see it’s still going, I’ve been coming here ever since I was a little slime.
One cake please!

Where would the slimes go if grandpa’s cafe shut down?
Maybe it’s worth trying to save.
<<portrait>>

title: introLore
body:
You inherit a cafe from your late grandfather and are tasked with reviving it. 
Your late grandfather ran the only slime cafe in town for slimes to enjoy pastries and drinks. 
It’d be a shame to lose it… the slimes would be disappointed if the cafe shut down. 
Going inside the cafe, it’s old yet classic. The furniture, decorations, and menu items haven’t been changed at all since it first opened.
Looking around, you should probably organize and clean the place first.
Go near the cups and plates scattered around the cafe to organize them!

title: Controls
body:
Press "z" to go to next dialogue line and/or choose an option
Hold "z" to also make text scroll faster.
Use arrow keys to move around.
Use up and down arrow keys to go to each option.
Press "e" to interact with appliances and customers.
Press "e" to clean up spills

title: fixAppliancesTutorial
body:
I should probably go and see if the appliances need fixing.
Go up to the microwave and coffee machine and press 'e' to start fixing them!

title: fixMicrowave
body:
Seems like the microwave needs to be fixed.
[[Fix the microwave|mFix1]]

title: fixCoffeeMachine
body:
seems like the coffee machine needs to be fixed.
[[Fix the coffee machine|cmFix1]]

title: foodTutorial
body:
I should probably test to see if I can still make drinks.
Go up to the coffee machine (Press 'e') to make a drink!

title: spillCleanupTutorial
body:
While I'm at it, I should probably cleanup these spills too.
Go up to the spills and press 'e' to clean them!

title: mFix1
body:
You noticed that the microwave does start, but does not heat up.
[[Unplug power and remove plastic vent|mFix3]] [[Turn it off then on again|mFix2]]

title: cmFix1
body:
You notice that some of the coffee machine components are loose.
You decide to tighten up the components.
There also seems to be some clogging and blockages inside the machine.
You decide to clean up the machine.
After some extra stuff... the coffee machine is fixed!
<<fixedCoffeeMachine>>
Press "z" to exit.

title: mFix2
body:
Turning it off then on again wields the same results.
[[Unplug power and remove plastic vent|mFix3]] [[Turn it off then on again|tangent1]]

title: mFix3
body:
With the upper vent removed, you see the control panel.
[[Remove control panel|mFix6]] [[Check if there is any control panel backing|mFix4]]

title: mFix9
body:
After installing the new door switch, you reattach the control panel and upper vent.
You turn on the microwave again and it starts working!
<<fixedMicrowave>>
Press "z" to exit.

title: mFix4
body:
There is no control panel backing to remove.
[[Remove the control panel|mFix6]] [[Double check|mFix5]]

title: mFix5
body:
A control panel backing does not magically appear.
[[Remove control panel|mFix6]]

title: grandpasPortrait
body:
...
.........
I miss you grandpa.
<<week1>>
[[Answer:week1Load|week1Load]]

title: portraitPutUp
body:
But, before I forget...
One last thing...
I should probably hang up the portrait now.

title: completedFoodTutorial
body:
Everything seems to be working, I was able to make some coffee.
It was delicious!
<<summary0>>
Press "z" to exit.

title: tangent1
body:
Are you dumb?
[[Yes|tangent2]] [[No|tangent2]] [[Unplug power and remove vent|mFix3]]

title: tangent2
body:
That...
That...that was a rhetorical question.
[[Oh|mFix31]] [[Unplug power and remove vent!!!|mFix3]]

title: mFix6
body:
With the control panel removed, you now see the door switch.
[[Remove door switch|mFix8]] [[Take a break|mFix7]]

title: mFix8
body:
With the door switch removed, you install a new door switch.
[[Install new door switch|mFix9]]

title: mFix7
body:
You decide to take a break before removing the door switch.
[[Remove door switch|mFix8]]

title: mFix31
body:
After a lengthy conversation with the voice inside your head...
You decide to unplug the power and remove the upper vent.
[[Remove control panel|mFix6]] [[Check if there is any control panel backing|mFix4]]

title: fixed1
body: Loading...

title: Quitting
body:
This might be too much for me...
Should I just quit?
[[Continue|Working]] [[Quit|endGame]]

title: Working
body: You decide to keep on working.

title: endGame
body:
You decide to quit.
Running a cafe just wasn't for you.
There are times where you have to realize that it's better to just let go.
<<playCredits>>
[[Going to next scene...|fixed1]]

title: summary5
body:
....
..........
This may not be for me...
<<endChoices>>
[[ Go to next week |endingLoad]]

title: sconeMade3
body:
<<if $sconeNum < 2>>
<<Scone>>
You made a scone! +1 scone
<<else>>
You can't carry anymore scones!
<<endif>>
